appDesc.description: The description of the application, displayed in the web store.
appDesc.message: The LEGO® Education WeDo 2.0 App allows students to explore great science projects.

appName.description: The title of the application, displayed in the web store and in the chrome://extensions page and in the Install dialog - max length: 45 chars.

appShortName.description: The title of the application, displayed in the App launcher - max length 12 chars.

closeApp.description: Text for close button on unsupported platforms

unsupportedOSMessage.description: Message to display if the OS is unsupported
unsupportedOSMessage.message: This is a Chromebook application. Please visit your app store to get LEGO® Education WeDo 2.0 for your device

updateAvailable.description: The message for users when an update is available while running the app
updateAvailable.message:
There is an update available with version: $NEW_VERSION$, you are currently running: $CURRENT_VERSION$.

When would you like to update?

updateHeader.description: Header for the update message box
